channel.title: What would you rather have happen to you?
channel.description:
Would you rather...... A) become sterile (unable to produce sperm properly) by a nasty blow to the groin area? or. B)Find out the girl u just made out with was a guy?
Post yah answers :)

item.title: What would you rather have happen to you?
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:23, topic:146060”]A.

Because if B happened, I would be forced to kill the transvestite and would either go to jail or spend the rest of my life on the run. Also not being able to get girls pregnant at my age is a great thing, and I wouldn’t mind adopting in the future.[/quote]
they are making a male: “The Pill” so you don’t have to trust your hoe. also decreses the need for child support.

edit: “they” being the drug makers

Read full topic

item.title: What would you rather have happen to you?
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

ok, i understand the weed part, just not the heavy drugs part. those are really bad. but people make bad decisions. but weed is a good decision. and i just read that doing meth for about a year makes your penis completely useless because after about 6 months, you can only have sex high, then after a year, you cant have it at all! that would be bad. if that happened to me, i would cry hard!

but good, you picked the right choice, lol.

item.title: What would you rather have happen to you?
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

[quote=“robocz033, post:11, topic:146060”][quote author=therealjdb link=topic=199978.msg1778118#msg1778118 date=1190669421]

dang. what kind of drugs do you use?

Currently just alcohol and tobacco, but when I did do all that shit it’s more like what didn’t I do, I mainly smoked marijuana(everyday), did cocaine, snorted prescriptions, parachuted prescriptions, ecstacy, LSC, shrooms, huffing, lots of alcohol. There is more I just don’t feel like getting more into detail as that would be extremely off topic. Anyhow I’m clean now.
[/quote]

your arent serious about that ^ ?
but if you are, your insane!

but its good you have switched to b, because sterile = bad![/quote]
No I’m serious about that, I just wasn’t serious about picking a. lol
